entry.title: Ethereum's Merge is Coming and the Stakes Couldn't Be Higher
entry.summary: The most important upgrade in blockchain history is slated for August. And the outcome of the Ethereum merge has huge implications for all of crypto.

entry.title: Why Ava Labs Wants the Bored Ape Metaverse and ApeCoin on Avalanche
entry.summary: Is an Avalanche subnet the key to powering Yuga Labs’ Otherside and the ApeCoin ecosystem? Ava Labs makes its case.

entry.title: How Scorsese Producer Niels Juul's KinoDAO Is Using NFTs to Fund Indie Films
entry.summary: The producer of Martin Scorsese’s “The Irishman” and “Silence” is turning to Web3 to cut out the Hollywood gatekeepers.

entry.title: Elon Musk Says SpaceX Will Accept Dogecoin—And DOGE Predictably Pumps
entry.summary: Bear market and all, Elon Musk can still move prices with his tweets.

entry.title: ‘The Irishman’ Exec Producer Niels Juul Gets Into NFTs
entry.summary: Decrypt’s Kate Irwin talks to veteran Hollywood film producer Niels Juul about why he’s going all in on NFTs and Web3.

entry.title: Ethereum, Solana and Gaming Tokens Are Falling Fast as Crypto Slump Continues
entry.summary: The wider market remains down, but Ethereum and other altcoins are feeling even more pain while gaming and metaverse tokens struggle.

entry.title: Stepn 'Move-to-Earn' Cryptocurrencies Plummet After App Says It Will Block Users in China
entry.summary: The twin tokens underpinning the popular crypto game Stepn plummeted after the project announced it would block gameplay in China.

entry.title: Terra Community Votes Unanimously to Destroy 1.3B UST Tokens
entry.summary: With more than 99.9% of votes approving the proposal, the supply of Terra’s stablecoin UST will drop by roughly 11%.

entry.title: Ethereum Liquidations Top $157M After Merge Upgrade Test Hits Snag
entry.summary: Following the Beacon Chain's block reorganization event, Ethereum dropped over 7% on Friday morning amid concerns around its planned merge.

entry.title: As Terra Dies and Forks, Protocols and Projects Move to Polygon
entry.summary: Polygon is calling on projects displaced and disgruntled by Terra’s collapse to join its ranks.

entry.title: How an Indie Author Is Using Ethereum NFTs to Engage and Inspire Readers
entry.summary: "Lost Children of Andromeda" translates a sci-fi book series into an NFT-powered “read-to-earn” game and creative community.

entry.title: Decrypt at Cannes: Decentralized Pictures CEO Leo Matchett Talks Hollywood Embracing Crypto
entry.summary: Decrypt's Stephen Graves heads to the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he sits down with Leo Matchett of Decentralized Pictures, the Roman Coppola-backed nonprofit using crypto and blockchain voting to find, fund, and produce films.

entry.title: Decrypt at Cannes: 'Calladita' Director Miguel Faus on Funding Films with NFTs
entry.summary: Decrypt's Stephen Graves is on the scene at the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he spoke to Miguel Faus, director of the film "Calladita," who funded his movie by selling NFTs to backers including NounsDAO.

entry.title: Ethereum Gaming DAOs Yield Guild, Merit Circle in Dispute Over Funding
entry.summary: Members of the Merit Circle DAO community want to refund Yield Guild’s seed investment, claiming a lack of additional support.

entry.title: Everything Elon Musk Has Planned for Twitter
entry.summary: Open-source code, in-app payments and… Dogecoin? Here's what the Tesla CEO plans for the social media platform post-takeover.

entry.title: ECB Chief and Bitcoin Critic Christine Lagarde Says Her Son Trades Crypto
entry.summary: But the central bank chief said she still wouldn’t go near digital assets.

entry.title: Tether Enters Latin American Market with Mexican Peso-Backed Stablecoin
entry.summary: Tether, the company behind the crypto industry’s largest stablecoin, has launched a new stablecoin pegged to the Mexican peso.

entry.title: Bitcoin Gaming App ZEBEDEE Integrates MoonPay
entry.summary: ZEBEDEE users in the U.S. can add Bitcoin funds via MoonPay, and soon will be able to sell Bitcoin for fiat currency as well.

entry.title: Hacker Steal Your Crypto? New MetaMask Tool Could Help You Get it Back
entry.summary: MetaMask will pay a crypto detective service called Asset Reality to help users who fell victim to a hacking attack on their wallet.

entry.title: Crypto Exchanges Including Binance, FTX To Support 'Terra 2.0' Relaunch
entry.summary: Cryptocurrency exchanges have pledged support to Terra's upcoming relaunch, following the passing of a proposal to launch a new blockchain.

entry.title: Elon Musk Commits $33.5 Billion to Twitter Acquisition Bid
entry.summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk will personally commit $33.5 billion to his Twitter buyout bid, according to a recent SEC filing.

entry.title: Uniswap, Chainlink Down 8% as DeFi Tokens Slump
entry.summary: Cryptocurrencies linked to decentralized finance dropped today, as total value locked in the DeFi ecosystem trends downwards.

entry.title: Ethereum Beacon Chain Suffers Longest Blockchain 'Reorg' in Years
entry.summary: The Ethereum Beacon Chain experienced a seven-block reorganization today. Here's what that means, and why it could have been a security risk.

entry.title: Portugal’s Parliament Says No to Bitcoin Tax—for Now
entry.summary: The decision came during a budget voting session on Wednesday.

entry.title: Deepfake Video of Elon Musk Promoting Crypto Scam Goes Viral
entry.summary: Another cryptocurrency scam featuring Elon Musk's likeness is doing the rounds—but this one is slightly more creative.

entry.title: DraftKings CEO on Accepting Crypto Payments: 'People Want It, We're Working Towards It'
entry.summary: As DraftKings edges more into the NFT business, might it begin accepting crypto for entry fees and bets? Jason Robins says it's likely.

entry.title: ‘Love, Death + Robots’ Returns to Netflix With NFT Scavenger Hunt
entry.summary: The QR codes for the NFTs will be scattered across the digital and physical world.

entry.title: Not Trippin': Solana Overtakes Ethereum in Daily NFT Trading Volume
entry.summary: Solana NFTs generated more money than Ethereum’s during a 24-hour span due in large part to the launch of the Trippin’ Ape Tribe collection.

entry.title: Bitcoin Pioneer Charlie Shrem: ‘A Lot of People Predicted’ Terra Collapse
entry.summary: In an interview at Cannes, Shrem also shared with Decrypt details on his new crypto film-financing project.

entry.title: Andreessen Horowitz Announces New $4.5 Billion Crypto Fund
entry.summary: Venture capital firm Andreessen Horowitz has raised $4.5 billion for its fourth cryptocurrency fund, bringing its total raised for crypto and blockchain investments to over $7.6 billion.

entry.title: Terra Community Approves Do Kwon’s Plans to Revive Project
entry.summary: The new Terra blockchain will be launched in the next couple of days and includes a new distribution of LUNA tokens.

entry.title: NFL and Mythical Games to Launch 'Play-and-Own' NFT Game 'NFL Rivals'
entry.summary: Even in this bear market, the NFL is bullish on blockchain gaming.

entry.title: Stripe Taps OpenNode, Lightning Network to Resume Bitcoin Payments
entry.summary: The payments company is partnering with OpenNode to let customers convert funds into Bitcoin for the first time since 2018.

entry.title: Crypto 'Has to Become Invisible' to Reach Mainstream: Mastercard Exec
entry.summary: Crypto needs to become an “invisible” part of the financial system to enable mass adoption, a Mastercard executive recently explained.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried to Spend Up to $1B on Donations for 2024 US Elections
entry.summary: The crypto billionaire Sam Bankman-Fried said he could donate between $100 million and $1 billion in the upcoming Presidential elections.

entry.title: Can Seth Green Still Make His NFT Show if His Bored Ape Was Stolen?
entry.summary: The theft of Seth Green's NFTs raises questions about intellectual property—including whether the actor can go forward with a planned show.

entry.title: Bitcoin Extends Record Streak of Weekly Losses to Eight
entry.summary: Before this month, the all-time mark was a six-week span in 2014.

entry.title: Brave Adds Solana Support and Ramp Wallet Functionality in Latest Browser Update
entry.summary: Brave is making crypto easier to buy through its wallet feature.

entry.title: Coinbase Becomes First Bitcoin Company Among Fortune 500
entry.summary: Coinbase ranked second overall in revenue growth among companies on the list, at 514%, trailing only Moderna.

entry.title: WeWork Founder Raises $70M for Carbon Credit Crypto Project, a16z Leads Round
entry.summary: Adam Neumann, the controversial founder of WeWork, is back with a new crypto startup that will offer a token tied to carbon offsets.

entry.title: Crypto Poses Risk to Financial Stability in ‘Present Trajectory’: ECB
entry.summary: Europe’s central bank has just released its latest outlook on crypto’s risk to financial stability. Its conclusion? Change needs to happen.

entry.title: Boss Cat Rocket Club Builds First All-Inclusive Metaverse on Cardano
entry.summary: NFT PFP collection Boss Cat Rocket Club (BCRC) is inviting other crypto-powered projects into its play-to-earn metaverse.

entry.title: Common Raises $20M to Build DAO Management Platform, Launch Token
entry.summary: Common’s investors include BitDAO, Spark Capital, and Jump.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 10: DraftKings Goes Crypto
entry.summary: Crypto and sports continue to converge, and one of the best examples is DraftKings. CEO Jason Robins joins Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts to talk about how DraftKings is embracing NFTs as prizes, when the company might accept crypto for entry fees and bets, and how his experience dealing with regulators and lawmakers mirrors what crypto companies are now going through in Washington.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What is Web3?
entry.summary: Web3 is the next evolution of the Internet, built on blockchains. Blockchains are a new kind of database, making new types of peer-to-peer apps possible. This has profound implications for humanity.

entry.title: How Brands Are Creating Immersive Experiences in the Metaverse
entry.summary: In Episode 10 of the Navigating the Metaverse podcast, hosted by Cathy Hackl and Tommaso di Bartolo, Andrew Hayward of Decrypt and Josh Roth of Decrypt Studios discuss how companies are approaching the metaverse, where it could all go next, and what it was like to watch a movie in a Lamborghini on the moon.

entry.title: #DecryptLIVE: Crypto crash roundtable
entry.summary: Crypto bloodbath! How low will the major coins go, and what about Terra and stablecoins? Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Jeff Benson, Stacy Elliott and Jason Nelson will discuss the news and parse through what’s happened and what might happen next.

entry.title: Infura Co-Founder E.G. Galano Talks Otherside NFT Mint, Ethereum Gas Fees
entry.summary: Infura co-founder and general manager E.G. Galano talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about what Infura does, how the Bored Ape Yacht Club could have avoided the hiccups with its Otherdeed NFT mint, other hot NFT collections like Moonbirds, and Ethereum's gas fee issues.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is Ethereum 2.0? Ethereum's Consensus Layer and Merge Explained
entry.summary: The long-planned upgrade to Ethereum aims to improve the network’s scalability and security by switching to a proof of stake consensus mechanism.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 9: Jesse Powell Releases the Kraken
entry.summary: Kraken was one of the earliest Bitcoin exchanges, and also made waves for its strong-willed reactions to regulatory changes. CEO Jesse Powell joined the gm podcast to talk to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about Kraken's evolution, the killer use case for NFTs, and how San Francisco's tech scene has changed.
